author: BBC News
title: Sesame Street star Emilio Delgado dies aged 81
description: The actor played shop owner Luis, a character who was praised for not conforming to Latino stereotypes.
content:
Image source, Getty Images
Image caption, Emilio Delgado appeared on Sesame Street from 1971 until 2016
